title: Tiny Home in the Forest!!!
posting_body: Live the pristine life in the forest in this cute remodeled tiny home!
Fully remodeled turnkey Tiny Home that DRIVES!
This is a fully liveable 26’ Ford Jamboree remodeled into a tiny home interior last summer:
Brand new on demand water heater
3 new vents (still in boxes you install when ready, others are working)
Portable carport has kept it dry
7 new custom mirrors for added light
Sell by August 1 for move in where is in Glacier and pay $525/mo including all utilities or take it on the road to live the free life!!!
Currently on 15 forested acres all hooked up to utilities avail on a monthly lease from the property company.
